name.ja: <ruby>無<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>孔<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>砲<rt>ほう</rt></ruby><ruby>塔<rt>とう</rt></ruby>－ディセイブラスター

text.en: If there is a column with no cards, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to that column. You can only Special Summon "Disablaster the Matchless Turret" once per turn this way. Negate all cards and effects activated in this card's column. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

pendulum_effect.en: Negate all cards and effects activated in this card's column.
